subject: Football
Domestic Violence
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: With Baltimore eliminated from the playoffs, Roger Goodell can now look forward to a Super Bowl week without fresh echoes of his botched handling of the Ray Rice case ringing in his ears.
snippet: With Baltimore eliminated from the playoffs, Roger Goodell can now look forward to a Super Bowl week without fresh echoes of his botched handling of the Ray Rice case ringing in his ears.
